item.title: No ‘golden age’ is coming. Trump’s tariffs will hit Americans with higher interest rates and more inflation.
item.description: Protectionism won’t make us rich — especially if tariffs launch a trade war.

item.title: Home Depot’s stock falls as customers are showing caution on large remodels
item.description: An uncertain macroeconomic environment and high interest rates weigh on the company’s guidance.

item.title: There are dot-com echoes beyond tech. This Costco shareholder explains why returns will be paltry at best.
item.description: A fund manager says there are parallels between now and the 1998-to-2000 period, and not just in the megacap tech stocks
